Description:
Detects default filenames output from the execution of CrackMapExec and Impacket-secretsdump against an endpoint.

Author: SecurityAura
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - Potential Remote Credential Dumping Activity Via CrackMapExec Or Impacket-Secretsdump
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\svchost.exe' and filepath re '\\Windows\\System32\\[a-zA-Z0-9]{8}\.tmp$'
